title: How Many Calories in a Bud Light Beer?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a beer Bud Light, including carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations. Get label-style nutrition for one 12 oz serving.
h1: How Many Calories in a Bud Light Beer?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) can or bottle of Bud Light lager, chilled, no added flavors or mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand batch, serving size, and temperature; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Bud Light beer contains 110 kcal and 6.6 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to regular Budweiser (higher carb version)
Pour into a 16 oz pint glass (larger serving)
Mix with diet soda for a lighter spritzer

faqs.q: How many calories in a Bud Light beer?
faqs.a: About 110 kcal per 12 fl oz serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in one Bud Light?
faqs.a: 6.6 g total carbs, with 0 g fiber and 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is Bud Light low in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, only 10 mg sodium per beer.

faqs.q: How does Bud Light compare to other light beers?
faqs.a: Similar to many light beers at 110 kcal, but check specifics for brands like Coors Light (102 kcal).

faqs.q: Does serving size affect calories in Bud Light?
faqs.a: Yes; a 16 oz serving adds about 37 kcal compared to 12 oz.
